description: Watch the best of the action as Championship side Ards go through to the Irish Cup semi-finals thanks to a 2-0 home win over Loughgall.
title: Irish Cup: Ards secure victory over Loughgall in quarter-final
title_page: Irish Cup: Ards secure victory over Loughgall in quarter-final - BBC Sport
